mapper.delete: delete from comment where user_id = #{userId} and recipe_id = #{recipeId}
mapper.select: select c.comment_id, c.recipe_id, c.user_id, c.score, c.content, u.user_id "user.user_id", u.username "user.username" from comment c inner join user u on c.user_id = u.user_id where c.recipe_id = #{recipeId}

select c.comment_id, c.recipe_id, c.user_id, c.score, c.content, r.recipe_id "recipe.recipe_id", r.user_id "recipe.user_id", r.recipe_name "recipe.recipe_name", r.pic_url "recipe.pic_url", r.material "recipe.material", r.profile "recipe.profile", u.user_id "recipe.user.user_id", u.username "recipe.user.username" from comment c inner join recipe r on c.recipe_id = r.recipe_id inner join user u on r.user_id = u.user_id where c.user_id = #{userId}
